LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.label: Chthonian
LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.description: Chthonians are powerful burrowers which can live for more than a thousand years, and are protective of their young. It is said that a chanting sound accompanies every chthonian, and that by such they can be detected while underground and unseen.
LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.tools.0.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.tools.1.label: coiling tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.tools.2.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.ROM_Chthonian.tools.3.label: body
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianLarva.label: Chthonian Larva
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianLarva.description: Chthonians are powerful burrowers which can live for more than a thousand years, and are protective of their young. It is said that a chanting sound accompanies every chthonian, and that by such they can be detected while underground and unseen.
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianLarva.tools.0.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianLarva.tools.1.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.ROM_ChthonianLarva.tools.2.label: body
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.label: cthulhid
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.description: Octopoidal humanoids, cast in in the image of great Cthulhu himself and bound to his will. They make a mockery of the human form, with a tentacled head, scaly body and vestigial bat-like wings. While insignificant in size, in comparison to their master, they stand many times taller than a man. They serve the Great Old Ones will while he remains sleeping.
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.tools.0.label: wings
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.tools.1.label: left claw
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.tools.2.label: right claw
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.tools.3.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.ROM_Cthulhid.tools.4.label: maw
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.label: Dark Young
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.description: A tree-like being, whose hooved roots carries an enormous black mass of branched tentacles, writhing around drooling mouths. They are the spawn of Shub-niggurath, the Black Goat with a Thousand Young and master of the woods. They act in its stead and come to worshippers in dark forests to accept sacrifice and reverence.
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.tools.0.label: hooves
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.tools.1.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.tools.2.label: coiling tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoung.tools.3.label: maws
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.label: Deep One
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.description: A fish headed but frog bodied humanoid with large bulging eyes and webbed hands. They have powerful scaly bodies, designed to withstand the pressures of the ocean.
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOne.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.label: Great Deep One
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.description: A grand fish headed but frog bodied humanoid with sizable razor fins, large bulging eyes, and webbed hands. They have powerful scaly bodies, designed to withstand the pressures of the ocean.
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.ROM_DeepOneGreat.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.ROM_MiGo.label: MiGo
LanguageData.ROM_MiGo.description: An insectile fungus with vast membranous wings, numerous segmented limbs and a forest of stubby antenna for a head. They are of an inquisitive mind and seek the brains of lesser species to further their understanding. They are known to search out planets that contain minerals their own worlds lack.
LanguageData.ROM_MiGo.tools.0.label: legs
LanguageData.ROM_MiGo.tools.1.label: overwhelming mind
LanguageData.ROM_MiGo.tools.2.label: body
LanguageData.ROM_Bullet_MiGoCastingWeapon.label: Rhombohedral Energy blast
LanguageData.ROM_MiGoCastingWeapon.label: Rhombohedral Energy Weapon
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.label: shoggoth
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.description: Large and oily masses that shift and change shape according to their needs. Eyes, mouth and tentacles appear, then just as swifty, are reabsorbed into the luminescent black protoplasm. They are reluctant servants to those that are willing to risk their rebellious nature.
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.tools.0.label: maws
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.tools.1.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.tools.2.label: right claws
LanguageData.ROM_Shoggoth.tools.3.label: left claws
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.label: shoggoth
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.description: Large and oily masses that shift and change shape according to their needs. Eyes, mouth and tentacles appear, then just as swifty, are reabsorbed into the luminescent black protoplasm. They are reluctant servants to those that are willing to risk their rebellious nature.
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.tools.0.label: maws
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.tools.1.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.tools.2.label: right claws
LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothColossal.tools.3.label: left claws

LanguageData.ROM_ShoggothTiny.description: Large and oily masses that shift and change shape according to their needs. Eyes, mouth and tentacles appear, then just as swifty, are reabsorbed into the luminescent black protoplasm. They are reluctant servants to those that are willing to risk their rebellious nature.

LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireSpawner.label: Star Vampire Spawner
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireSpawnerAlbino.label: Star Vampire Spawner
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireSpawnerAbberation.label: Star Vampire Spawner
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampireSpawnerNight.label: Star Vampire Spawner
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.label: Star Vampire
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.description: It is invisible until it feeds - the devoured blood slowly reveals its bloated form as its veins are filled. Its obscene maw is surrounded by tentacles, each tipped with either talons or hungry suckers. It descends from the stars to feed and returns with a tittering laugh.
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.tools.0.label: needles
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.tools.1.label: tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.tools.2.label: coiling tentacles
LanguageData.ROM_StarVampire.tools.3.label: teeth
LanguageData.ROM_PitChthonian.label: strange sinkhole
LanguageData.ROM_PitChthonian.description: A massive tunnel that burrows deep beneath the earth. A strange chanting can be heard from within.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_MiGo.description: Extracted material from the outer shell of the MiGo. This material is a form of matter that does not occur naturally on worlds on the rim.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_MiGo.label: MiGo matter
LanguageData.CH_Leather_Chthonian.description: Tanned, dried, scraped skin. A good traditional material for making clothes and bags.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_Chthonian.label: chthonian chitin
LanguageData.CH_Leather_Cthulhid.description: Tanned, dried, scraped skin. A good traditional material for making clothes and bags.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_Cthulhid.label: star-spawn skin
LanguageData.CH_Leather_DarkYoung.description: Tanned, dried, scraped skin. A good traditional material for making clothes and bags.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_DarkYoung.label: dark-young bark
LanguageData.CH_Leather_DeepOne.description: Tanned, dried, scraped skin. A good traditional material for making clothes and bags.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_DeepOne.label: deephide
LanguageData.CH_Leather_StarVampire.description: Tanned, dried, scraped skin. A good traditional material for making clothes and bags.
LanguageData.CH_Leather_StarVampire.label: star-vampire leather
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealSimple.label: strange simple meal
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from a few... odd ingredients.
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealFine.label: strange fine meal
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of... odd ingredients.
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealLavish.label: strange lavish meal
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeMealLavish.description: A... masterpiece? of the culinary... arts?, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and... soul?
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeKibble.label: strange kibble
LanguageData.ROM_StrangeKibble.description: Kibble animal feed made from mixed plants and... meat?
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_Meat.label: untouchable meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_CthulhidMeat.label: cthulhid meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_CthulhidMeat.description:
Raw meat from a Star-Spawn of Cthulhu.
Cthulhid flesh is a putrid soupy mess of meat, more liquids than solids and exuding an odor that would make vat grown soldiers gag in revulsion. Cthulhid meat tastes of coffee which has fermented for months in a tin of moldy tobacco. When consumed, any meal containing Cthulhid meat will create deep, bottomless feelings of regret. Most of these feelings are directly tied to the actual taste of the meal.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_DeepOneMeat.label: Deep One meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_DeepOneMeat.description:
Raw meat from a Deep One.
To dine upon Deep One flesh is to experience something rigid and gelatinous simultaneously, as if ingesting rotting softshell crabs dipped in petroleum oils. When consumed, Deep One flesh will cause vague feelings of terror and unease.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_MiGoMeat.label: MiGo meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_MiGoMeat.description:
Raw meat from a MiGo.
MiGo meat is not actually meat. In actuality, it is a fungus with a meaty thickness, spongy consistency, and raw insect taste that exudes oil from pulpy fibers. Many intrepid diners describe the experience as "reminiscent of a particularly boring lecture on biology." Repeat diners have reported suffering from nightmares of distant planetscapes dotted with disembodied brains in clear canisters, luring the dreamer to join them and experience wonders most profound.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_ShoggothMeat.label: Shoggoth meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_ShoggothMeat.description:
Raw meat from a Shoggoth.
The flesh of the Shoggoth is chewy and salty, rubbery like a mussel and imbued in the salty brine of the oceans in which they slither and shamble. The taste is incredibly fishy, soaked in a bodily fluid with the consistency of slime. If this ooze is purged, the taste is noticeably cleaner, but will still taste of mussels. If enough Shoggoth meat is consumed, the diner experiences the sound of lapping water from all sides, as well as the sensation of vision from all angles.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_StarVampireMeat.label: Star Vampire meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_StarVampireMeat.descriptio:
Raw meat from a Star Vampire.
Star Vampire meat's marbling ranges from an uncomfortable amount of intramuscular fat to an obscene helping of it. If one can pick their way around the fat, the actual Star Vampire meat tastes of iron and licorice, and if cooked without the fat cut away, the marbling melts in the heat to sweeten the meat and add a savory flavor. Such fine dining comes with a price. After supping the delicacy, diners are often seen sprinting and screaming from their tables, proclaiming visions of blood streaming from the walls, cupboards, and the eyes of their friends and loved ones.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_DarkYoungMeat.label: Dark Young meat
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_DarkYoungMeat.description: Raw meat from the Dark Young.
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_ChthonianMeat.label: Chthonian strips
LanguageData.ROM_RawCHFood_ChthonianMeat.description: Raw meat strips from a Chthonian.
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoungSap.label: dark young sap
LanguageData.ROM_DarkYoungSap.description: Sweet sap squeezed from an orifice of one of the foul children of Shub-Niggurath.
LanguageData.ROM_Filth_BloodCosmicHorror.label: vile blood
LanguageData.ROM_Filth_BloodShoggoth.label: protoplasm
LanguageData.ROM_Filth_BloodMiGo.label: fungus
